metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7608 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The ebl_object_note_type_name function in eblobjnotetypename.c in elfutils 0.168 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3
libasm1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3
libdw1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3
libelf1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.158-0ubuntu5.3').
